answers.answer: Hi there!Annual neurology, nephrology and ophthalmology exams are advised in diabetics who have had the condition over a few years. One could see an internist or a neurologist for a comprehensive diabetic foot exam.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: Curious if everyone with type 2 diabetes is getting an annual comprehensive diabetic foot exam?If so, where did you have your foot exam?
title: annual foot examination
